posts.post_content:
Unfortunately life is getting in the way of collecting and I may have to part with my cornerstone.

Prefer cash offers but will consider a cash + trade that includes low grade T206 HOFers with nice fronts.

Email me and let's chat.

[url]mike@cardtarget.com[/url]


[IMG]http://www.cardtarget.com/images/Untitled-2.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.cardtarget.com/images/Untitled-1.jpg[/IMG]

Bump from last year's unsold BST post.    My checking account could use a boost these days and I'd consider selling this card again now.   

Would also consider cash + trade of other T206 HOFers that I don't have.
